name: reaper-cloth
effect: Held by Dusclops: Evolves the holder into Dusknoir when traded.
short_effect: Traded on a Dusclops: Holder evolves into Dusknoir.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A cloth imbued with horrifyingly strong
spiritual energy.
It is loved by a certain Pokémon.
